code: import"./Books.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BooksNavbar(_ref){let{books,selectedBookId,onSelect,onDelete}=_ref;if(!books.length){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"books-navbar books-navbar--empty",children:"No books added yet"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"books-navbar",children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"books-navbar__item-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"books-navbar__item ".concat(selectedBookId===book.id?"active":""),onClick:()=>onSelect(book),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"books-navbar__cover",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.coverUrl,alt:book.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"books-navbar__title",children:book.title})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"books-navbar__delete",onClick:e=>{e.stopPropagation();onDelete(book.id);},"aria-label":"Delete ".concat(book.title),children:"\xD7"})]},book.id))});}
